element.name: For Fear Of Little Men by Orangetigerprawn, Traditional Cache (2/3.5)
element.description: Traditional cache located on the Wicklow way on the edge of Tibradden Wood not too far from The Pine Forest Arts Centre. There is parking space for one or two cars at a squeeze about 10 minutes walk from the cache; N53 13.724, E6 15.889. Not too much to it. The name of the cache comes from the following poem which came into my mind on the way up the hill.
element.long-description:
The Fairies
Up the airy mountain
Down the rushy glen,
We daren't go a-hunting,
For fear of little men;
Wee folk, good folk,
Trooping all together;
Green jacket, red cap,
And white owl's feather!
Down along the rocky shore
Some make their home,
They live on crispy pancakes
Of yellow tide-foam;
Some in the reeds
Of the black mountain-lake,
With frogs for their watch-dogs,
All night awake.
High on the hill-top
The old King sits;
He is now so old and grey
He's nigh lost his wits.
With a bridge of white mist
Columbkill he crosses,
On his stately journeys
From Slieveleague to Rosses;
Or going up with music,
On cold starry nights,
To sup with the Queen
Of the gay Northern Lights.
They stole little Bridget
For seven years long;
When she came down again
Her friends were all gone.
They took her lightly back,
Between the night and morrow;
They thought she was fast asleep,
But she was dead with sorrow.
They have kept her ever since
Deep within the lake,
On a bed of flag leaves,
Watching till she wake.
By the craggy hill-side,
Through the mosses bare,
They have planted thorn trees
For pleasure here and there.
Is any man so daring
As dig them up in spite?
He shall find their sharpest thorns
In his bed at night.
Up the airy mountain
Down the rushy glen,
We daren't go a-hunting
For fear of little men;
Wee folk, good folk,
Trooping all together;
Green jacket, red cap,
And white owl's feather!
William Allingham (1824-1889)
element.additional-waypoints:
PK1RNP8 - For Fear Of Parking
N 53째 13.724 W 006째 15.889

ul.li:
2010-06-10T19:00:00Z : Found it by colmyster
Lovely scenic area. It feels like I've walked the entire Wicklow Way today. TFTC
In: dinosaur Out: Travel bug

2010-03-22T19:00:00Z : Found it by Bootle
Lovely walk in a lovely part of the country. The views here were amazing, thanks for bringing me here! TFTC!

2010-03-13T20:00:00Z : Found it by Spark_ie
Second cache of my morning, the trees along the path on the north side of the cache are amazing, such great colour ! Great place for a cache, co-ords were spot on, and had the cache within seconds. Left a Geocoin, TFTC, Spark_ie

2010-01-30T20:00:00Z : Found it by Donnacha
Enjoyed the walk to the cache and the surrounding views. Thanks.

2009-08-11T19:00:00Z : Found it by drphill
Found this chache during a 2 weeks visit from sweden. TFTC
